title: Crime Alert 05.20.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.20.21
description:
Man bonds out of jail, only to be caught the same day, ransacking a fire station. Man keeps calling 911 because he needs a ride home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
